alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:58PM EDT until July 19 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sampson County in central North Carolina... Central Cumberland County in central North Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Fayetteville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Eastover, Stedman, Autryville and Vander. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
